title: Women Investing in the School of Education (WISE) Endowed Student Support Fund
description: To provide support for students enrolled in the School of Education at the University of Colorado Boulder.  Support may include professional development and enrichment experiences.
marketingContent:
Distributions from this fund will be used to provide support for students enrolled in the School of Education at the University of Colorado Boulder. Student support includes but is not limited to: scholarships, professional development and enrichment experiences. The Dean of the School of Education in consultation with members of the WISE giving circle who have contributed to the fund, if possible, will determine the greatest needs of the school in any given year.

The Women Investing in the School of Education (WISE) giving circle is comprised of local and national women who support the core values and beliefs of the School of Education and believe in the power of education to change lives. Members include alumnae and friends, teachers, retired teachers, and those involved in education in other ways. In addition to this important Scholarship, WISE Members also award annual grants to many teaching, research, and outreach initiatives in the School that may otherwise go unfunded. Through this direct involvement, members learn about the innovative partnerships that are taking place in our local schools and communities.
